titleStmt.title: A learned and fruitful exposition vpon the Lords prayer. By Arthur Dent, sometime minister of the Word of God at South-Suberry, in Essex
titleStmt.author: Dent, Arthur, d. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Snodham] for Nicholas Bourne, and are to be sould at the entring into the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: With a prayer by H.S. beginning on F3, and a general thanksgiving by T.S. beginning on F5.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark; the last leaf is blank.
Running title reads: A fruitfull exposition vpon the Lords prayer.
Imperfect; leaves F3-8, the last probably blank, lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the entring into the Royall Exchange
